name: ilovepdf_bot
description: A Telegram Bot that helps you to do many things with PDFs.

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID. Get it from my.telegram.org.

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash. Get it from my.telegram.org.

API_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram bot token. Get it from @BotFather.

ADMINS.description: List of admin user IDs separated by spaces (optional).

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Set to 'True' to restrict bot usage to admins only (optional).

BANNED_USERS.description: List of banned user IDs separated by spaces (optional).

ADMIN_GROUPS.description: List of admin group IDs separated by spaces (optional).

ADMIN_GROUP_ONLY.description: Set to 'True' to restrict bot usage to admin groups only (optional).

BANNED_GROUP.description: List of banned group IDs separated by spaces (optional).

ONLY_GROUP_ADMIN.description: Set to 'True' to restrict bot usage to group admins only (optional).

COFFEE.description: Set to 'True' to enable coffee mode (optional).

SEND_RESTART.description: Set to 'True' to send restart notifications (optional).

PROTECT_CONTENT.description: Set to 'True' to prevent users from forwarding files from the bot (optional).

MULTI_LANG_SUP.description: Set to 'True' to enable multi-language support (optional).

REFER_BETA.description: Set to 'True' to enable beta referral (optional).

STOP_BOT.description: Set to 'True' to stop the bot (optional).

SOURCE_CODE.description: URL for the bot's source code (optional).

OWNED_CHANNEL.description: URL for the bot's official channel (optional).
